name: Appointment Reminders powered by Twilio
description: A template for getting started with Appointment Reminders using Twilio and Ruby on Rails.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID. Get a free account at twilio.com/try-twilio

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token. You can get it at twilio.com/console

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: The Twilio phone number you want to use to send SMS. Get one in the Twilio Console
